description: A button component. Renders an HTML button or, if an href is provided, renders using NeonLink in the style of a button. NeonButton supports all events and attributes of HTML buttons, e.g, @click.

props.name: href
props.description: Optional href for rendering a button as a link

props.name: label
props.description: The text to display on a button

props.name: iconPosition
props.description: Position of the icon if combined with text

props.name: state
props.description: Provide button states of ready, loading, success or error which change the display of the button (with icons) to reflect the state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether or not the button is disabled

props.name: outline
props.description: Whether or not to display a button outline when the button has focus

props.name: circular
props.description: Make the button circular. NOTE: This is only for icon only buttons.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: Make a button extend to the full width of the parent container.

props.name: indicator
props.description: INTERNAL USE ONLY: display a NeonExpansionIndicator on the button (used for dropdown buttons)

props.name: indicatorExpanded
props.description: INTERNAL USE ONLY: display the NeonExpansionIndicator on the button as open or closed.
